doc:
Bill Kennedy (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bill_Kennedy_(actor) 0 Willard "Bill" Kennedy (June 27, 1908 – January 27, 1997) was an American actor, voice artist, and host of the long-running Detroit-based television show, Bill Kennedy at the Movies. He began his career as a staff announcer in radio; Kennedy's voice narrates the opening of the television series Adventures of Superman. Willard_"_Bill_"_Kennedy ( June_27_,_1908 – January_27_,_1997 ) was an_American_actor , voice_artist , and host of the_long-running_Detroit-based_television_show , Bill_Kennedy at the_Movies . He began his_career as a_staff_announcer in radio ; Kennedy 's_voice narrates the_opening of the_television_series_Adventures of Superman .
